item.title: Helix for vim users
item.description:
Update

Once again, it appears that what I really want is to just change my Vim colourscheme, rather than switching to a new editor. Though I’ll admit that I’m liking Zed a lot these days.

Periodically, I have a go at using an editor other than vim. This normally results in me realising that I just needed a change of vim colour scheme but Iâ€™ve just discovered Helix which might be just enough like vim for me to stick around.
